code: import React from'react';import{Stack,Typography}from'@mui/material';import Icon from'../assets/icons/gym.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BodyPart=_ref=>{let{item,bodyPart,setBodyPart}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{type:"button",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",className:"bodyPart-card",sx:{borderTop:bodyPart===item?'4px solid #FF2625':'',backgroundColor:'#FFF',borderBottomLeftRadius:'20px',width:'270px',height:'280px',cursor:'pointer',gap:'47px'},onClick:()=>{setBodyPart(item);window.scrollTo({top:1800,left:100,behavior:'smooth'});},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Icon,alt:"dumbbell",style:{width:'40px',height:'40px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{fontSize:"24px",fontWeight:"bold",color:"#3A1212",textTransform:"capitalize",children:item})]});};export default BodyPart;
